description: The El Search Party arrived at the Water Temple, where they encountered the demon Ran. Chung overpowers the demon but before he could finish him off, Ara blocks his attack, allowing Ran to escape. Ara explains that Ran was formerly her brother and she is searching for a way to save him. Chung empathizes with her and reassures her. After being freed, the Water Priestess Sasha pleads to the El Search Party to rescue the other Priestesses.
